subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5941 has been delivered
description_text: Hello, My package has delivered and pedals are in the box, but no haptic motors! Are they coming separately? Thank you! Best wishes, Kevin Sent from my iPhone On Jan 15, 2026, at 2:05 PM, SIMSONN <service @simsonn.com> wrote: Your order has been delivered SIMSONN Order #SSN5941 Your order has been delivered Haven't received your package yet? Let us know View your order or Visit our store Other tracking numbers: 1ZJ201H40321920807 SF6047238969281 Items in this shipment Newest Simsonn Plus X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics Reactor Ã— 1 Plus X-P3-H3 / Black Part of: Newest Simsonn Plus X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics Reactor If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service @simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Coss, Yes, your order was shipped in two separate packages. Here is the tracking link for the package that hasn't arrived yet. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238969281
